topicTitle: i'm just gonna drop this here

posts.postText:
hey, my names mark. i'm 14, 15 in July, admin on all NNJG servers. i've been with NNJG since Shadow's jail. I have a life, I get out as much as possible, i'm not very active on the servers anymore for that reason. I used to be on like 24/7, but i got friends, family, and hobby's to deal with. I tag in real life, zerb is my tag name. (sorry if you don't like people who tag, it's a hobby, i've do it for fun with friends). what is zerb? ze=zebra. r=the r in mark. b=my last name. (the r in mark just makes it all go together.)

so anyways, feel free to ask me some questions.

(this thread is for people who don't really know me or want to know more about me)

>> so anyways, feel free to ask me some questions. 
do you have foreskin?

>> >> so anyways, feel free to ask me some questions. 
do you have foreskin?  you know it. (i lol'd at this question, <3 you kry)
can you post some of you art?
